participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Active, health-conscious, and enjoys trying new foods.
participant_1.background: I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center. I have a bicycle. I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet. I have been exposed to a variety of cultures and lifestyles due to my upbringing. I live in the US and work out in my home gym every day to stay fit.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Playful, creative, and enjoys spending time with family and pets.
participant_2.background: I have a soccer ball in my baby's nursery. I still like unicorns even though I’m an adult. I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy. I play the piano to help my siblings relax. I want to get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift.

content.text: I am doing good! What about you?
I am doing well. I am an archer and I like to eat sushi. Do you like sushi?
I do! I like it with everything on it! It is so good!
I like it with avocado and cucumber. That is my favorite.
I love avocado! I put it on everything!
I do too! It is so good for you!
I know! It is so healthy!
I have a bicycle and I work out in my home gym every day to stay fit.
That is awesome! I like to go on walks with my dog Percy.
I have a dog too! His name is Bailey and he is a golden retriever.
I love golden retrievers! They are so sweet!
I know! They are the best!
I am going to go get a bagel with everything on it before I start my shift. Do you want one?
No, thank you. I am not hungry right now.
Okay. Well, I have to go. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day!
